Calculates a natural energy scale for a trapped ion system

  • q (float) – Charge of ion

  • omega (float) – Trapping strength

trical.misc.linalg.multi_gram_schmidt(b, tol=1e-05)[source]¶
trical.misc.linalg.orthonormal_component(v, b, tol=1e-05)[source]¶
trical.misc.linalg.orthonormal_subset(x, tol=0.001)[source]¶

Finds an approximate orthonormal subset of a set of vectors, after normalization.

Parameters

  • x (numpy.ndarray) – Set of vectors of interest.

  • tol (float, optional) – Tolerance when classifying 2 vectors as orthonormal , defaults to 1e-3.

Returns

Orthonormal subset of the set of vectors of interest, after normalization.

Return type

numpy.ndarray

trical.misc.optimize module¶

Module containing default optimization function generators for TrICal.

trical.misc.optimize.dflt_ls_opt(deg)[source]¶

Default optimization function generator for multivariate_polyfit function.

Parameters

deg (numpy.ndarray) – Degree of polynomial used in the fit.

Returns

Default optimization function that finds the best polynomial, of the specified degree, fit for the data .

Return type

types.FunctionType

trical.misc.optimize.dflt_opt(ti, **kwargs)[source]¶

Default optimization function generator for equilibrium_position method of TrappedIons class.

Parameters

ti (trical.classes.trappedions.TrappedIons) – Trapped ion system of interest.

Returns

Default optimization function that finds the equilibrium position of the trapped ions system of interest via the minimization of the potential.

Return type

types.FunctionType

trical.misc.polynomial module¶

Module containing relevant functions regarding polynomials for TrIcal.

trical.misc.polynomial.multivariate_polyfit(x, vals, deg, l=1, opt=<function dflt_ls_opt>)[source]¶

Fits a set of data with a multivariate polynomial.

Parameters

  • x (numpy.ndarray) – Independent values.

  • vals (numpy.ndarray) – Dependent value.

  • deg (numpy.ndarray) – Degree of polynomial used in the fit.

  • l (float, optional) – Length scale used when fitting, defaults to 1.

  • opt (types.FunctionType, optional) – Generator of the appropriate optimization function for the fit, defaults to trical.misc.optimize.dflt_ls_opt.

Returns

Coefficients of the best fit multivariate polynomial, of the specified degree.

Return type

numpy.ndarray
